description: Try our easy to follow Overnight Weetbix With Mixed Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Low fat,Peanut free,Muesli, granola & porridge
name: Overnight Weetbix With Mixed Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Aussie Frozen Fruit Mixed Berries

recipeInstructions.text: Crush Weetbix into container, add milk and smooth with spoon then set aside.
Add yoghurt and honey to a bowl and mix together. Spoon yoghurt on top of Weetbix and set aside.
Add berries to a small saucepan and heat on low until berries turn into a syrup (approx. 10 mins) - stirring occasionally. Set aside to cool slightly.
Once cooled, add berry syrup on top of yoghurt layer, swirl with spoon, add extra frozen berries if desire. Cover container with lid and refrigerate overnight.
